1.0.name: wordpress/ivona-webreader
1.0.description:
Before you install the plugin

In order to voice-over your website, you need to create a free iWebReader account and activate your 14 Days free Trial. If you are interested in buying full version of the service, please contact us via the form on our website.

What is iWebReader ?

iWebReader is a high-tech service based on multiple-award-winning IVONA Text-To-Speech technology which allows website owners to voice-over web page content, making it more attractive and accessible to visitors. Thanks to this service, users can not only listen to selected text, but also download and save it as audio files. With iWebReader, you get access to all the voices and languages available in the IVONA suite of Internet services. The intuitive user interface and amazingly natural voices intensify the visitor’s exp
